1.name: Ray
1.description: Can deploy a sandbeast within Attack Range to scout an area for 15s, extending Attack Range into that area. Prioritizes attacking targets within this area, and deals 10% more Physical damage to them

2.name: Logs
2.description: When attacking a target, there is a 40% chance to deal 60% ATK as Arts damage to a random target in attack range and Slow it for 0.8s
